mapper.insert: insert into weart_board(board_originidx, board_code, board_subject, board_content, board_writer, board_image, board_ip, board_remove_tag) select ifnull(MAX(board_idx)+1, 1), 0, #{board_subject}, #{board_content}, #{board_writer}, #{board_image}, #{board_ip}, #{board_remove_tag} from weart_board
mapper.select: select A.* from( select * from weart_board where board_delyn='N' and board_idx=board_originidx and board_subject like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and board_remove_tag like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and board_writer like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by board_date desc order by board_like desc order by board_reply desc )A limit ${(page-1)*12}, ${page*12}

select count(*) as cnt from weart_board where board_delyn='N' and board_subject like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and board_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and board_writer like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.update: update weart_board set board_hits = board_hits+1 where board_idx=#{board_idx}
mapper.select: select * from weart_board where board_delyn='N' and board_idx=#{board_idx}
mapper.update: update weart_board set board_delyn='Y', board_date=now() where board_idx=#{board_idx}
mapper.select: select * from weart_board where board_delyn='N' and board_idx=#{board_idx}
mapper.update: update weart_board set board_subject=#{board_subject}, board_content=#{board_content}, board_image=#{board_image}, board_remove_tag=#{board_remove_tag}, board_date=now() where board_idx=#{board_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from weart_board where board_delyn='N' and board_originidx=#{board_idx} and board_idx!=#{board_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into weart_board(board_originidx, board_code, board_content, board_writer, board_ip) values(#{board_idx}, 0, #{board_content}, #{board_writer}, #{board_ip})
mapper.update: update weart_board set board_reply = board_reply+1 where board_idx=#{board_idx}
mapper.select: select board_like from weart_board where board_idx=#{board_idx}
mapper.update: update weart_board set board_like = board_like+1 board_like-1 where board_idx=#{board_idx}
